phases.title: Phase 4: AGENTS — MCP & Autonomous AI
phases.description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) for building agents and extending ShaneBrain. Teaches users to connect AI tools via MCP servers, build autonomous agents that use ShaneBrain's infrastructure, and create custom tool pipelines. MCP is REQUIRED for all agent and ShaneBrain integrations going forward.
planned_topics: MCP fundamentals — what Model Context Protocol is and why it matters
MCP server setup — running and configuring MCP servers locally
MCP for ShaneBrain — connecting ShaneBrain tools (Weaviate, Ollama, vault) as MCP resources
Building agents with MCP — autonomous AI agents that use MCP tool pipelines
Agent-to-agent communication — multiple agents coordinating via MCP
Custom MCP tools — building your own MCP server for family/business tools
Security with MCP — permission models, local-only enforcement, audit logging
phases.notes: MCP must be the standard protocol for all Agent and ShaneBrain integrations. No agent or ShaneBrain extension should bypass MCP.
